writer.name: Nathalie Alonso Casale Nathalie Alonso Casale

director.name: Nathalie Alonso Casale Nathalie Alonso Casale

this_title: Figner: The End of a Silent Century
introduction: A story about the almost unknown soviet cinema through the eyes of Edgar Figner, one of the last remaining Foley Artists. A story about the mechanism of memory and about the different meanings of Silence. There is silence in the History of sound recording in the Russian cinema. There is also Silence in the social and political enclosing in which Russia remained for almost a century. Written by Nathalie Alonso Casale
chinese_title: Figner: The End of a Silent Century
